title: Mario Kart
description: Rev your engines and test your Mario Kart knowledge!

questions.question: What item can you throw behind you or forward to hit opponents?
questions.explanation: Green Shells travel in a straight line and can be thrown forward or dropped behind!

questions.question: The Blue Shell targets the player in first place.
questions.explanation: The dreaded Blue Shell (Spiny Shell) flies to first place and explodes, often ruining victories at the last second!

questions.question: What is the most famous rainbow-colored track in Mario Kart?
questions.explanation: Rainbow Road is the iconic final track in most Mario Kart cups, known for being beautiful and difficult!

questions.question: What does the Lightning Bolt item do?
questions.explanation: The Lightning Bolt shrinks all other racers, making them slower and vulnerable to being squished!

questions.question: You can do a speed boost by drifting in Mario Kart.
questions.explanation: Drifting and holding it builds up a mini-turbo boost, essential for competitive racing!

questions.question: Which character is the heaviest in most Mario Kart games?
questions.explanation: Bowser is typically the heaviest character, giving him high top speed but slower acceleration!

questions.question: What does the Bullet Bill item do?

options.text: Transforms you into a Bullet Bill that auto-drives

questions.explanation: The Bullet Bill transforms your kart, automatically driving at high speed and knocking away anyone in your path!

questions.question: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe is available on the Nintendo Switch.
questions.explanation: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe is one of the best-selling Switch games, with the Booster Course Pass adding 48 extra tracks!
